ufolib.fontizer
Interface FontSource

All Known Implementing Classes:
BdfFont
public interface FontSource

FostSource is an ascending sorted Unicode encoded fixed size font source. If vector font, you can request a size; please provide a default size.

openFile

public boolean openFile(java.lang.String name)
Open font file. All other set/get methods have to appear afterwards.
Parameters:
name - filename
Returns:
false, if it fails

fontIsFixedSize

public boolean fontIsFixedSize()
bitmap font or vector font
Returns:
true, if bitmap font; if false, the fontCoreSize() is probably undefined and you can/must use fontSetPixelSize()

fontSetPixelSize

public boolean fontSetPixelSize(int size)
set pixel size
Returns:
false, if it fails (i.e. its a bitmap font)

fontSetEncoding

public boolean fontSetEncoding(java.lang.String enc)
Set encoding. Remember: The Font Source implementation must always provide unicode encoded chars. This is to set the encoding by the user if the file's encoding is not given by the file. So, calling this method forces the implementation to reorganize its chars.
Returns:
false, if it fails

fontEncoding

public java.lang.String fontEncoding()
Get encoding.
Returns:
null, if default

the free form properties

fontNumberOfChars

public int fontNumberOfChars()
Number of chars

fontGlyphDataByIndex

public FontGlyphData fontGlyphDataByIndex(int index)
One Glyph (by char index, not by encoding)
Returns:
the glyph, or null if index out of range

fontGlyphDataByEncoding

public FontGlyphData fontGlyphDataByEncoding(int enc)
One Glyph (by unicode place (=encoding) not by index)
Returns:
the glyph, or null if the char is not included
